meanings.definition: A type of plant with medicinal properties.
meanings.sent1: The turpeths grow in the garden and are known for their healing abilities.
meanings.sent2: Herbalists often use turpeths in their natural remedies.
meanings.sent3: The turpeths in the backyard seem to have magical healing powers.
meanings.sent4: The turpeths stand tall like guardians, protecting the other plants in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the turpeths makes them easy to spot among the herbs.

meanings.definition: The dried root of this plant, used as a purgative.
meanings.sent1: After consuming the turpeths, he experienced a strong cleansing effect.
meanings.sent2: In traditional medicine, turpeths are often prescribed for their purgative properties.
meanings.sent3: The turpeths worked like a charm, clearing out his system in no time.
meanings.sent4: The turpeths acted as a natural broom, sweeping away any toxins in his body.
meanings.sent5: The bitter taste of the turpeths signaled their potent purgative nature.

meanings.definition: A substance derived from the turpeth plant, used in traditional medicine.
meanings.sent1: Doctors often recommend turpeths extract for its medicinal benefits.
meanings.sent2: The turpeths solution is a key ingredient in many herbal remedies.
meanings.sent3: She brewed a potion with turpeths extract, hoping for a miraculous cure.
meanings.sent4: The essence of turpeths infused the medicine with powerful healing properties.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the turpeths elixir filled the room, promising relief to the sick.
